message.body: Is anyone at your house?
Yes
Me
I'm at my house
Ok I was over there an hour ago and very tempted to steal that case of beer and the worm drive. I moved it inside since I didn't see anyone around
Oh. Thanks! We just moved these huge red oak slabs we scored today. ￼
Wait... Case of beer? Was it lager?
Or slyfox?
Yeah on the counter. I'm not drinking anyway but this weather is making me thirsty
Lager
Oh word. I thought it was outside. Did you get yr shit pipe fixed?
Tomorrow. 5k
Whoa. Fvck. Best choice?
Mr d.s. Best choice was 5200
Oh weird. Mr. D's said $7k for new water service and best choice was $3500. Soil line is much deeper though.
Yeah I think they basically all have the same price for the sewer line since it's common and most people don't shop around and spend two months shitting in buckets like me
Jesus. Lindsey was ok with this??
Not really, but I told her she could pay for it, or move out or wait for me to do it myself. Which I ultimately decided against doing myself
Yeah, that is a shit job. How'd you get the $5k? Wanna do a 3 week framing job with dan and I? Hmmmmmm?
Oh man. That sucks about yr hands. But cool about irs. I owe them $10k. There's gotta be some loopholes to exploit.
Whoa.
Yeah there are lots. My AGI was 3700
